title: Group portrait of one boy, three girls, three men, including groom second from left wearing dark bow tie, and four women standing, including bride center left wearing earrings, necklace, light colored wedding dress with ruffled skirt, light colored cropped satin jacket, and short floral lace fingerless gloves, gathered around table with light colored tablecloth and three tiered wedding cake in interior with windows with floral curtains, possibly on Broad Street in East Liberty
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
